page.title: 04Whitehills Parish Churches
page.content: The {Church of Scotland} maintains two churches, {St. Brandon's,Boyndie,} and {Trinity, Whitehills.}The{Church } {Hall}is also used by a number of outside charitable organisations. The Church has 497{Adult} {Communicants, }and a{Sunday School roll of 72, with 6 voluntary teachers.The {Churchwomen's Guild has {35 members. The Kirk Session,} consisting of the{Minister}and 20 {Elders,}deals with spiritual and physical matters affecting the congregation. The Session has {Committees for Youth, Sunday School, {Guild, Fabric and Finance. }The { {Session Clerk }deals with correspondence, agenda and minutes of meetings. The village also has a {Methodist {Church} under a minister resident in Findochty, and a{Brethren Church.}
